content.rendered:
Mission

(Our mission is to spread the light of faith equally)
Bhakti and Seva, the path of perfection and an achievement

GEOKC is a faith related non-profit organization that was established for one purpose – our bahkti to Lord Krishna, and spreading the light of the Hindu faith. Our mission is to create a community with significant meaning. Devotees will develop their spiritual, religious, and educational lives by joining our Bhakti Yoga Programs. We provide bhakti related services to all individuals, families, communities, and societies living anywhere and all around the world on local, state, national, and international levels, inviting them to be a part of our organization.

Through our devotional programs and services GEOKC supports the practice of Hindu religion. Through these programs and services GEOKC trying to express devotion in a significant manner and making a link between our devotees and Lord Krishna. In our programs the complete life sketch of Lord Shri Krishna as its included in the Activity of Sravana Bhakti of Shri Krishna Lilas, includes all of His Lilas (beginning from his birth and ending with His last Lila, the time His spirit left to heaven) and we are conducting this activity permanently. All parts of His Lilas are beautifully explained in this spiritual discourse and only by Pujya Guruji, the Main Head Guruji of GEOKC. This activity specifically express our devotion to Lord Krishna and a attractive features of our devotional programs. After joining this activity all participants really feel the joy of deep love (devotion) which never ends.
